adjective.description: Situated behind or beyond the kidney.

Occurring or existing in the urine after it leaves the kidney; designating, relating to, or suffering from a disorder, especially kidney failure, resulting from processes which occur in the urinary tract, or which prevent the excretion of urine after its formation.

origin: 1920s; earliest use found in Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London. From post- + renal.
